item.title: nodejs 一定要通过 nvm安装
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: 使用 nvm 管理不同版本的 node 与 npm step 补充说明：Mac 下通过 brew install nvm 所安装的 nvm ，由于安装路径不同，无法正确启用。建议使用 brew uninstall nvm 卸载掉之后，通过本文的方案

item.title: git中submodule子模块的添加、使用和删除
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: 背景 项目中经常使用别人维护的模块，在git中使用子模块的功能能够大大提高开发效率。 使用子模块后，不必负责子模块的维护，只需要在必要的时候同步

item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: 基础 http://blog.jobbole.com/87584/ 高效的结对编程 在Tmux 中使用 Tmate 在文本间快速移动光标，复制文本 将复制下来的文本发送到系统的剪贴板中 Select and copy text 调整 Tmux 以增强其同 Vim 的集成度 调

item.title: 用户加入docker组
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: Docker 创建docker用户组，应用用户加入docker组 创建docker用户组 1 sudo groupadd docker 应用用户加入docker用户组 1 sudo usermod -aG docker ${USER} 重启docker

item.title: linux 关闭SSH 连接用户
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: 1.查明登陆端口； 1 2 3 $ who root pts/1 Apr 8 00:06 (172.29.0.29) root pts/2 Apr 8 04:15 (172.29.0.21) 2.通知该用户将要关闭他： 1 $ echo "I will close your connection" > /dev/pts/2 这样他的终端将显示该信息。 3.关闭用户连接

item.title: 官方中文文档 openstack swift overview rings
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: https://docs.openstack.org/swift/queens/overview_ring.html OpenStack Docs: The Rings The Rings updated: 2019-01-15 02:30 The Rings¶ The rings determine where data should reside in the cluster. There is a separate ring for account databases, container databases, and individual object storage policies but each ring works in the same way. These rings are externally managed. The server processes themselves do not modify the rings; they are instead given new rings

item.title: Can scp create a directory if it doesn't exist?
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: Can scp create a directory if it doesn’t exist? As far as I know, scp itself cannot do that, no. However, you could just ssh to the target machine, create the directory and then copy. Something like: 1 2 ssh user@host "mkdir -p /target/path/" && scp /path/to/source user@host:/target/path/ Note that if you are copying entire directories, the above is not needed. For example, to copy the directory ~/foo to the remote host, you could use the -r (recursive) flag:

item.title: openstack swift(笔记)
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: replication 默认为3 每次上传的文件，会经过ring选择3个硬盘存储。 可以看下面这个图的倒数3行命令的结果 eventually consistent Eventually Consistent：最终一致性 看一下 http://duanple.blog.163.com/blog/static/7097176720114733211308/
